__TOC__

{{ http://www.boyden.us/images/timboyden192x192.jpg }}

Tim is a professional Systems Administrator of 16+ years with experience in Microsoft Windows, Apple Macintosh, and various Linux distributions. Tim is an Open Source evangelist seeking to promote the use of Open Source technologies wherever feasible. When time permits, he can be found lurking in the forums looking to assist fellow Ubuntu users get the most out of their new operating system. In addition to his day job, Tim is seeking a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Information Systems with a concentration in Mobile Application Development at Kaplan University.

Tim is also the President of Uber Technologies LLC, a value added reseller of Intel-based desktops, laptops, and server systems. Uber Technologies Luna brand systems feature a wide selection of customization options including the choice of Ubuntu as a pre-installed operating system. Uber Technologies provides local consulting services in Connecticut, Maine, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, and Vermont in the USA.

Uber Technologies website: http://www.uber-technologies.com

Luna brand PCs website: http://www.luna-pc.com
